item.title: Writing to HBase from Hadoop Mapper
item.description: Although Hadoop and HBase are often used together, not so many resources devoted to interaction between them. In the book “HBase: The Definitive Guide” there is a chapter named “MapReduce Integration”, which sheds some light on this. I would like to give you another example of the MR task that reads and writes to the same HBase table.
